verbs.description: Details : The San Diego Diocese [V: is] seeking a way to shelter asylum - seekers so they can remain with their children , according to Bishop Robert McElroy who celebrated a binational Mass June 9 at the U.S .- Mexico border . McElroy said the diocese is answering the Trump administration policy of separating children from parents who seek asylum or enter …
